data.eml:eml: New earthworm species of the genus Amynthas from Hainan Island, China (Megascolecidae, Clitellata)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Qi, Yao, Xuanzhu, Lan, Yaqiong, Xu, Junxian, Qiu, Jiangping (2018): New earthworm species of the genus Amynthas from Hainan Island, China (Megascolecidae, Clitellata). Zootaxa 4496 (1): 279-286, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4496.1.23
